CatDescriptText: Mr. Eugene Reinhardt, College Park, Monroeville was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 4, 1958, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that Sherman Adams was guilty of misconduct in the office of assistant to the President? Do you think that he should have resigned?" answer reads: "I've seen the headlines and listened to his speech, but I feel that I'm not qualified to give an opinion.  I don't know the whole story."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Eugene Reinhardt wearing dark gabardine suit, standing in front of Allegheny Country Courthouse, Downtown
